doc.title: Performing Elephants
doc.plot: These monsters were trained by Mr. Wm. Emory, who is known to the profession as a master in his line. It is a most wonderful undertaking to attempt to train elephants to perform in a Circus ring, and do the bidding of a man over whom they tower. These sagacious animals act beautifully, and one of them performs a real Cake-Walk.
